attributes.action: Prevent MPs from changing party while parliament is sitting
attributes.additional_details:
If an MP wants to change party they should wait for a General Election or trigger a by-election.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossing_the_floor
https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN02537
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_elected_British_politicians_who_have_changed_party_affiliation
https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN02537.pdf
attributes.background: In the UK, the great majority of voters probably vote for a candidate based on the party that he/she represents, not on the personal qualities of the individual. They expect the candidate to represent the party's views in parliament. By changing party, MPs use & abuse the people who voted for them.
